entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Morris
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:15 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this morning and early this afternoon. Light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near midnight then clearing. Blowing snow after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight then diminishing to 20. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
